title: Traditional Chinese cures battle for acceptance in COVID-19 fight
author: Staff Writer
description: Herbal medicines being used on the coronavirus frontline, but mainly in China
cleaned_text: SHANGHAI -- Many Chinese people are using traditional medicines to help fight off the new coronavirus, but the ancient cures still face a test of international acceptance. While laboratory-developed drugs such as Avigan and remdesivir are touted for their potential to fight the virus itself, traditional Chinese medicine, or TCM, has been prescribed in China to relieve mild pneumonia symptoms in COVID-19 patients.
